official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to submit a report to the Congress before carrying out any plan for the renovation, development, or use of any building ancillary to the Statue of Liberty National Monument.

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of the Interior to report to the Congress before carrying out any plan for the renovation, development, or use of any building on Ellis Island or any other building that is ancillary to the Statue of Liberty National Monument. Prohibits the Secretary from carrying out such plan before the expiration of the 90-day period beginning on the date of the submission of the report.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to submit a report to the Congress before carrying out any plan for the renovation, development, or use of any building ancillary to the Statue of Liberty National Monument.
